lines: A Mukombe Mwami wa kujulu, A muimbe luyando lwa Leza;
Ntobo yesu a Mugwa syi a Conde Mupati, Ukankamanisya , Nguwe.
A muimbe nyonse luse lwakwe, Utupa muzenge a kumweka;
Uzuma muma kumbi a mujulu, Ulenda mumundima a muluwo.
Bana batete a bateteete, Twasyoma muli ndimwe o Mwami
Mutubambe a luse lwenu buyo, Mulengi a Mugwa syi a Muvuni.
Luleenda Ômalundu a Ômabanda; Lwaboneka mu mume a mu mvula
